changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: KFTP-1210 Parameters which control the run of the PopulateFinancialSystemDocumentHeadersFromKewJob

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Determines the maximum number of documents that the PopulateFinancialSystemDocumentHeadersFromKewJob will handle in a given run. Any non-numeric, zero, negative, or empty value will be treated as if the job should convert all available Financial System document header records.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Determines the maximum number of document headers that the PopulateFinancialSystemDocumentHeadersFromKewJob will read at once. Any non-numeric, zero, negative, or empty value will be treated as if the default value of 1000 has been chosen.

changeSet.author: KFS54
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSCNTRB-1761- Fund groups that allow backdating of the expiration date

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Fund groups that allow backdating of the expiration date.

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSCNTRB-1793 for standard roll sizes

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Counts of coins per roll for each standard roll. Note: each roll is defined in the format of denomination =countPerRoll; countPerRoll must be a positive integer; all 6 rolls shall be defined, separated by semicolon; the order of them does not matter.

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: If yes, commodity codes are automatically added to vendors when a REQS becomes a PO.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If yes, commodity codes are automatically added to vendors when a REQS becomes a PO.
